    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class corrector.figure.Figure

        array, color, selected

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      default constructor
      Rectangle(Point2D p)
      Constructor of a rectangle from a given point in parameter. a small rectangle of 40x40 pixels is created at the same time, exclusively for the handling of one of the fundamental points of a figure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int nbPoints()
      Method that return the number of points needed to construct a basic rectangle, ie the number of points of entry.

      • Methods inherited from class corrector.figure.IPolygon

        changePoints, contains, display, toPolygon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        default constructor

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(Point2D p)
        Constructor of a rectangle from a given point in parameter. a small rectangle of 40x40 pixels is created at the same time, exclusively for the handling of one of the fundamental points of a figure. This rectangle will be deleted when finished an action with the mouse on the figure.
        Parameters:
        p -

    • Method Detail

      • nbPoints

        public int nbPoints()
        Method that return the number of points needed to construct a basic rectangle, ie the number of points of entry.
        Overrides:
        nbPoints in class Quadrilateral
        Returns:
        Intger the number of point needed (two points)
